targets.role: Prompt Engineer / Member of Technical Staff
targets.intro: Anthropic's focus on safe, steerable AI aligns directly with my work on Agentic Titan's safety invariants. I don't just prompt models; I build the orchestration machinery that ensures they operate within constitutional bounds at scale.

Vercel defines the modern web. My experience building 'in-midst-my-life' (Next.js 16 + RSC) and orchestrating 91 repos proves I understand the platform depth required to build tools for other developers.

Having already delivered 328% ROI for the Foundation, I am ready to scale that success system-wide. I combine institutional knowledge with modern DevEx rigor to modernize the college's digital infrastructure.

Design is no longer just visual; it is systemic. My work bridging narrative theory (MFA) with generative code (p5.js/WebAudio) fits IDEO's legacy of human-centered innovation in the age of autonomous systems.
